title: A New Look for the Sullivans Island Club!
post:
Earlier this summer, we kicked off our capital project fundraising efforts with the Taste of Sullivans Island event, where we raised money to renovate our club and showed off the incredible businesses right here on our island.

Thanks to your generous support, we were able to take a significant step towards our capital project goals. One of the first things we invested in was a fresh, modern website.

What's New on the Website?

Our new website is designed to enhance your experience as a member. Here's a sneak peek of what you can expect:

  • Event Calendar: Easily view upcoming events and register with just a few clicks.
  • Membership Services: Sign up for membership, securely pay dues online, and access a password-protected member directory.
  • Event Request Form: Submit club rental requests or suggest new events and activities you'd like to see offered at the club.
  • Progress Updates: Stay informed about the latest developments on our renovation project, fundraising efforts, and fun activities at the club.

Your Support is Essential

As we continue to work towards our capital project goals, your support is more important than ever. Every donation helps us bring our vision to life. Together, we can create a Sullivans Island Club that we're all proud to call our own.
